*Bloodhaven* is a 3x3 grid of places.

3 vertical streets and 3 horizontal streets.

Use _*/move*_ to jump between locations (e.g., */move 11*).

At each location, you might find buildings.

Use _*/enter*_ to step inside.
Try _*/map*_ anytime to see all of Bloodhaven.
Try _*/where-am-i*_ anytime to see where you are and whatâ€™s here.
Inside buildings, use */look* to see list of people and objects in the room.
Use */exit* to leave the building and return to the location.
Talk to NPCs with */talk name* (e.g., */talk neighbor*).
